app.title: AltStore
app.description: AltStore is an alternative app store for iOS devices that allows you to sideload apps without jailbreaking. It uses a unique method of sideloading apps by leveraging a developer feature in iOS.

app.title: Sideloadly
app.description: A sideloading tool for macOS and Windows

app.title: SideStore
app.description: A modified version of AltStore that uses Wi-Fi for sideloading instead of USB
